result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Austin J. Heil
Current: 2207 Setter Dr, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States  (Effective: 10-17-2016)
Prior: 2317 Dubay Drive, Knowlton, WI 54455

Case Called: 9:32am. Clerk: Denise. INCLUDES 14CF907, 14CF946, 14CM1964, 15CF98, 15CF201. State appears by ADA Desiree Toldt for Lisa Gramer. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Suzanne O'Neill. *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to DRI 14CF907 & 15CF98- crt grants. State moves to DRI ct 1 (bj/felony); ct 3 (theft); ct 6 (bj/felony); ct 7 (bj/misd) 14CF946- crt grants. State moves to DRI cts 2-6 (bj/felony); ct 7 (dc) 15CF201- crt grants. State moves to amend ct 1 (bj/felony) to 1 ct of misd/bj (946.49(1)(a) 15CF201- crt grants. PLEA: NO CONTEST - ct 2 (theft); ct 4 (bj/misd); ct 5 (poss drug para) 14CF946; ct 1 (dc) 14CM1964; amend ct 1 (bj/misd); ct 8 (bj/misd) 15CF201. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  Statements by State & Defense. Atty O'Neill makes statement re: restitution. Defendant makes statement. COURT ORDERS: SWH - 2 yrs probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school; must obtain high school diploma or equivalent; Counseling; AODA; Absolute Sobriety; 30 hrs Community Service; No violent contact with T.R. & B.R.; Restitution Joint & Several w/ co-defendant N.W.- $3,336.05 to T.L. to be paid @ the rate of $140 per month; Court Costs; DNA Surcharge; ltr of apology to victim T.L. 14CF907 and Defendant's mother. 25 days credit in the event of revocation. Adjourned: 9:54am.

Case called: 11:08am. Clerk: Denise. INCLUDES 14CF907, 14CF946, 14CM1964, 15CF98.  State appears by ADA Chad Minder for Lisa Gramer. Defendant appears by  and with Atty Suzanne O'Neill. Matter set for Plea. State indicates new charges 15CF98 and Restiution issue on that matter. Atty O'Neill in agreement for matter to be reset. Bond to Continue. DATES: Calendar Call 2/23/15 @ 1pm. Adjourned: 11:11am.
Defendant must attend every class, every day unless has valid doctor's excuse.
